import React from 'react' import { useState, useEffect } from 'react' function EditInfo() { const [isChecked, setIsChecked] = useState(false) const handleCheck = (e) => { setIsChecked(e.target.checked) } const handleFileChange = (e) => { const file =e.target.files[0] console.log(file) const formData = new FormData() formData.append('profile-pic', file) fetch('/owner/edit', { method: 'POST', body: formData }) .then(response => response.json()) .then(data => { console.log(data) }) } return (
